title: Like Adrian Peterson, Majority Of U.S. Parents Use Physical Discipline
teaser: Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson was indicted on charges of child abuse for hitting his son with a tree branch. Robert Siegel talks to Elizabeth Gershoff, professor of human ecology at the University of Texas at Austin, about the history of corporal punishment.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
